sourcesContent:
const theme = {
  colors: {
    primary: "#2563eb",
    secondary: "#64748b",
    success: "#10b981",
    danger: "#ef4444",
    warning: "#f59e0b",
    info: "#06b6d4",
    light: "#f8fafc",
    dark: "#0f172a",
    text: "#1e293b",
    white: "#ffffff",
    gray: {
      50: "#f8fafc",
      100: "#f1f5f9",
      200: "#e2e8f0",
      300: "#cbd5e1",
      400: "#94a3b8",
      500: "#64748b",
      600: "#475569",
      700: "#334155",
      800: "#1e293b",
      900: "#0f172a",
    },
  },
  spacing: (n = 1) => `${n * 8}px`,
  radius: "12px",
  shadow: "0 10px 25px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 4px 6px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)",
  breakpoints: {
    sm: "640px",
    md: "768px",
    lg: "1024px",
    xl: "1280px",
  },
}

export default theme
